languages.text: "Отметить славной азартной игрой со ставками. Таково желание хозяйки праздника". {n}Джай достает из кармана стопку резных пластальных плиток, украшенных символами и тонкими маг-линиями. Сжимая их в одной руке, а другой подняв кубок, контрабандистка интересуется:{/n} "Как думаете, шерин, найдется у Вольного Торговца что поставить на кон?"

"And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"
languages.original_text: "Отметить славной азартной игрой со ставками. Таково желание хозяйки праздника". {n}Джай достает из кармана стопку резных пластальных плиток, украшенных символами и тонкими маг-линиями. Сжимая их в одной руке, а другой подняв кубок, контрабандистка интересуется:{/n} "Как думаете, шерин, найдется у Вольного Торговца что поставить на кон?"

Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

"And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

languages.text: “最好的庆祝方式，就是玩游戏了，不是吗？当然，咱们得赌点什么东西才行。今天是我的及冕礼，就玩这个吧。”{n}婕伊从口袋里掏出一叠雕刻好的塑钢片，上面装饰着符号和精致的磁线。婕伊一手拿着塑钢片，一手举起酒杯。{/n}“你觉得怎么样，亲爱的？行商浪人有没有什么打算赌的东西？”
languages.original_text: "And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

traits.locale_text: “最好的庆祝方式，就是玩游戏了，不是吗？当然，咱们得赌点什么东西才行。今天是我的及冕礼，就玩这个吧。”{n}婕伊从口袋里掏出一叠雕刻好的塑钢片，上面装饰着符号和精致的磁线。婕伊一手拿着塑钢片，一手举起酒杯。{/n}“你觉得怎么样，亲爱的？行商浪人有没有什么打算赌的东西？”

languages.text: 「ゲーム以上に素晴らしいお祝いの方法がある？当然、賭け金もあるよ。今日はあたしのアンマリカーさ」{n}ジェイはポケットからプラスチールのタイルを取り出す。タイルにはシンボルと細かいマグラインが描かれている。片手にタイルを持ち、もう片方の手でグラスを掲げて、ジェイは尋ねる。{/n}「どうかな、シャリーン。自由開拓者は何か賭けてもいいものを持っている？」
languages.original_text: "And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

traits.locale_text: 「ゲーム以上に素晴らしいお祝いの方法がある？当然、賭け金もあるよ。今日はあたしのアンマリカーさ」{n}ジェイはポケットからプラスチールのタイルを取り出す。タイルにはシンボルと細かいマグラインが描かれている。片手にタイルを持ち、もう片方の手でグラスを掲げて、ジェイは尋ねる。{/n}「どうかな、シャリーン。自由開拓者は何か賭けてもいいものを持っている？」

languages.text: «¿Qué mejor forma de celebrar que con un juego? Apostando, naturalmente. Hoy es mi ammaricar y eso es lo que quiero hacer». {n}Jae saca un montón de fichas de plastiacero talladas. Está decoradas con símbolos y tenues líneas magnéticas. Sujetando las fichas en una mano y levantando su copa con la otra, Jae te pregunta:{/n} «¿Qué me dice, shereen? ¿Tiene algo que apostar como Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué mejor forma de celebrar que con un juego? Apostando, naturalmente. Hoy es mi ammaricar y eso es lo que quiero hacer». {n}Jae saca un montón de fichas de plastiacero talladas. Está decoradas con símbolos y tenues líneas magnéticas. Sujetando las fichas en una mano y levantando su copa con la otra, Jae te pregunta:{/n} «¿Qué me dice, shereen? ¿Tiene algo que apostar como Comerciante Independiente?».

languages.text: « Et quelle meilleure célébration qu'un bon petit jeu ? Avec des mises, bien sûr. C'est mon ammaricar, aujourd'hui, et c'est ce qui me fait envie. » {n}Jae sort de sa poche une pile de tuiles gravées en plastacier, ornées de symboles et de fines lignes magnétiques. Tenant les tuiles dans une main et levant son verre de l'autre, Jae demande :{/n} « Alors, shereen ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a-t-elle quelque chose à mettre en jeu ? »
languages.original_text: "And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

traits.locale_text: « Et quelle meilleure célébration qu'un bon petit jeu ? Avec des mises, bien sûr. C'est mon ammaricar, aujourd'hui, et c'est ce qui me fait envie. » {n}Jae sort de sa poche une pile de tuiles gravées en plastacier, ornées de symboles et de fines lignes magnétiques. Tenant les tuiles dans une main et levant son verre de l'autre, Jae demande :{/n} « Alors, shereen ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a-t-elle quelque chose à mettre en jeu ? »

languages.text: "Und wie kann man besser feiern als mit einem Spiel? Natürlich mit Einsätzen. Heute ist mein Ammaricar und das ist mein Wunsch." {n}Jae zieht ein paar eingeritzte Plastahlsteine aus der Tasche. Sie sind verziert mit Symbolen und feinen Mag-Linien. Jae hält die Platten in einer Hand und hebt ihr Glas mit der anderen. Dann fragt sie:{/n} "Was denkt Ihr, Shereen, hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} irgendetwas, dass {mf|er|sie} als Wetteinsatz einsetzen will?"
languages.original_text: "And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

traits.locale_text: "Und wie kann man besser feiern als mit einem Spiel? Natürlich mit Einsätzen. Heute ist mein Ammaricar und das ist mein Wunsch." {n}Jae zieht ein paar eingeritzte Plastahlsteine aus der Tasche. Sie sind verziert mit Symbolen und feinen Mag-Linien. Jae hält die Platten in einer Hand und hebt ihr Glas mit der anderen. Dann fragt sie:{/n} "Was denkt Ihr, Shereen, hat {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} irgendetwas, dass {mf|er|sie} als Wetteinsatz einsetzen will?"

languages.text: "Oyun oynamaktan daha iyi bir kutlama şekli var mıdır? Bahisli tabii. Bugün benim ammarikarım ve istediğim şey de bu." {n}Jae, cebinden bir dizi oyulmuş plasçelik çıkarıyor. Sembollerle ve mıknatıslı çizgilerle bezenmişler. Tek elinde karoları tutan, diğer eliyle de bardağını kaldıran Jae soruyor.{/n} "Ne dersin şirinim, Hür Tacir'in bahse yatırmak istediği bir şeyleri var mı?"
languages.original_text: "And what better way to celebrate than with a game? With stakes, naturally. Today is my ammaricar and that's what I want." {n}Jae draws a stack of carved plasteel tiles from her pocket. They are decorated with symbols and fine mag-lines. Holding the tiles in one hand and raising her glass with another, Jae asks,{/n} "What do you think, shereen, does the Rogue Trader have anything {mf|he|she}'s willing to wager?"

traits.locale_text: "Ve oyun oynamaktan daha iyi bir kutlama şekli var mıdır? Bahisli bir şekilde elbette. Bugün benim ammarikarım ve istediğim şey de bu." {n}Jae cebinden bir dizi oyulmuş plasçelik çıkarıyor. Sembollerle ve mıknatıslı çizgilerle bezenmişler. Tek elinde karoları tutan, diğer eliyle de bardağını kaldıran Jae soruyor:{/n} "Ne düşünüyorsun şirinim, Hür Tacir'in bahse yatırmak istediği bir şeyleri var mı?"
